summary.body: There's a very weird sort of skinny fox-type creature with black and brown splotches , foxshaped head and long tail, looks hairless from here, which ahs just appeared on the school site below my window. Tell me how to import a photo and I'll put one on the chat-room. Wotizzit???   [/img]
summary.subject: What on earth is this creature?

summary.body: I sent, or thought I did, a private message yesterday, but when I viewed my message boxes, it appeared in my Outbox only, not my Sentbox. Can someone clarify this for me, please? I wrote the message and clicked on Submit, do I need to do anything else?
summary.subject: Private message boxes

summary.body: I've got a query over a plant in my window box and wanted to post a picture of it on here but can't work out how to do it - i've got a picture which is saved on my laptop as a jpeg file, but can't seem to cut and paste it onto this email - anyone got any ideas how i can do this? thanks!
summary.subject: pictures
